data.text: @FriedrichHayek That's misinformation.    Not everyone who was unvax'd with covid has long term effects.   In fact, it's not even a majority.    Stop preaching.  It's a personal choice and each can make the risk/reward decision on their own
@FriedrichHayek If you don’t believe the efficacy of the vaccines were massively oversold then your politics outweigh the reality.

@FriedrichHayek Is that a fact? What percentage, would you say? You’d have to perform a hundred internet searches, and dig through medical papers for this data, while every dumbed down graph that bombards me on TV or the Internet is framed exactly like yours. Odd, that.
@youtwitface What has long term effects is COVID in the unvaccinated.
@RAHarrisonPA @JonahDispatch It does reduce the spread. The data and the science also show that.
@TheRizIsHere11 @JonahDispatch An unvaccinated friend of my daughter 17 years old just died from COVID. I am not fine.
@Seth_Horwitz There are such studies. You are too lazy to look for them.
@NameNotPublic Only the very ignorant believe that it was sold as a cure, and the virus has radically evolved in the last year. Stop gaslighting me with ignorance and stupidity.
